Entry.JapaneseText: カイル
Entry.EnglishText: Kyle

Entry.JapaneseText: リアラ
Entry.EnglishText: Reala

Entry.JapaneseText: スタン
Entry.EnglishText: Sthan

Entry.JapaneseText: ルーティ
Entry.EnglishText: Rutee

Entry.JapaneseText: …どうかしたの、カイル？
Entry.EnglishText: ...What's wrong, Kyle?

Entry.JapaneseText: リアラ、オレ、考えたんだ。 今のこの世界から 去るわけにいかないよね
Entry.EnglishText: Reala, we can't just leave this world as it is now, can we?

Entry.JapaneseText: 自分の世界を放っておくのは 心が痛むけどさ、でも目の前で 困った人を見過ごすなんて出来ない！
Entry.EnglishText: It hurts to leave my world behind, but I can't ignore those in need right in front of me!

Entry.JapaneseText: どうしたんだ？ 大きな声出してたけど
Entry.EnglishText: Is something wrong? You were speaking loudly.

Entry.JapaneseText: 父さ…スタンさん！ オレ、決めました！
Entry.EnglishText: Father... Mr. Sthan! I've made up my mind!

Entry.JapaneseText: 帰れる時が来れば すぐ帰るつもりだったけど、 全部かたがつくまで、ここに残ります
Entry.EnglishText: I was planning to return as soon as I could, but I'll stay here until everything is settled.

Entry.JapaneseText: あらあら、付き合いがいいわね。 自分の事よりも他人の事だなんて、 随分お人好しじゃない？
Entry.EnglishText: You're so considerate, always putting others before yourself. You're quite the softy, aren't you?

Entry.JapaneseText: そうかもしれません。 でも、やっぱこの世界の人達の事、 オレ好きですから！
Entry.EnglishText: Maybe so. But I really care about the people in this world!

Entry.JapaneseText: ね、いいだろ？ リアラ
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, is that okay? Reala.

Entry.JapaneseText: わたしは…、あなたに賛成だわ。 カイル。 あなたの思う通りにやってみて
Entry.EnglishText: I... I agree with you, Kyle. Do what you think is right.

Entry.JapaneseText: う〜ん…、前から思ってたんだけど、 リアラはカイルを放任しすぎじゃない？ もっと手綱握っておかないと
Entry.EnglishText: Hmm... I've been thinking, Isn't Reala letting Kyle do whatever he wants too much? We need to control him.

Entry.JapaneseText: そう…ですか？
Entry.EnglishText: Is that so?

Entry.JapaneseText: 男のわがままなんかに いちいち付き合ってたら駄目ね
Entry.EnglishText: You can't just indulge every whim of a man.

Entry.JapaneseText: 自分の理想を叶える前に おばあちゃんになっちゃうわよ？
Entry.EnglishText: You'll become a grandmother before you fulfill your own dreams!

Entry.JapaneseText: それは違うよ、ルーティ！
Entry.EnglishText: That's not true, Rutee!

Entry.JapaneseText: カイルは世界を守りたいんだ。 世界を守って、みんなの未来まで 守りたいって言ってるんじゃないか
Entry.EnglishText: Kyle wants to protect the world. I think he wants to protect everyone's future by protecting the world.

Entry.JapaneseText: うん、その通りだよ！ みんなが幸せになるには、 世界が平和じゃないと！
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah, that's right! Everyone can only be happy if the world is at peace!

Entry.JapaneseText: …やっぱり似てますね
Entry.EnglishText: ...They really are alike.

Entry.JapaneseText: ほんと不思議なぐらい似てるわねぇ。 兄弟か従兄弟かってぐらいに
Entry.EnglishText: They really are strangely similar. Like siblings or cousins.
